item.title: HiEAG: Evidence-Augmented Generation for Out-of-Context Misinformation Detection
item.description: arXiv:2511.14027v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: Recent advancements in multimodal out-of-context (OOC) misinformation detection have made remarkable progress in checking the consistencies between different modalities for supporting or refuting image-text pairs. However, existing OOC misinformation ...<br><br><small><strong>Source:</strong> arXiv | <strong>Keywords:</strong> large language model, instruction, paper, RAG, arxiv | <strong>Relevance:</strong> 100%</small>
item.author: noreply@contextengineering.news (arXiv)

item.title: Synthetic Clinical Notes for Rare ICD Codes: A Data-Centric Framework for Long-Tail Medical Coding
item.description: arXiv:2511.14112v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: Automatic ICD coding from clinical text is a critical task in medical NLP but remains hindered by the extreme long-tail distribution of diagnostic codes. Thousands of rare and zero-shot ICD codes are severely underrepresented in datasets like MIMIC-II...<br><br><small><strong>Source:</strong> arXiv | <strong>Keywords:</strong> RAG, arxiv, experiment, zero-shot, prompt | <strong>Relevance:</strong> 100%</small>
item.author: noreply@contextengineering.news (arXiv)

item.title: SCALEX: Scalable Concept and Latent Exploration for Diffusion Models
item.description: arXiv:2511.13750v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: Image generation models frequently encode social biases, including stereotypes tied to gender, race, and profession. Existing methods for analyzing these biases in diffusion models either focus narrowly on predefined categories or depend on manual int...<br><br><small><strong>Source:</strong> arXiv | <strong>Keywords:</strong> alignment, arxiv, image, analysis, zero-shot | <strong>Relevance:</strong> 100%</small>
item.author: noreply@contextengineering.news (arXiv)

item.title: Context-Engineering - "Context engineering is the delicate art and science of filling the context window with just the right information for the next step." — Andrej Karpathy. A frontier, first-principles handbook inspired by Karpathy and 3Blue1Brown for moving beyond prompt engineering to the wider discipline of context design, orchestration, and optimization.
item.description: "Context engineering is the delicate art and science of filling the context window with just the right information for the next step." — Andrej Karpathy.
